name: Mara Detron
description: For Orokin-era smugglers, this fearsome handheld shotgun was a favored tool for 'dispute resolution'.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Detron Mara having the name switched as Mara Detron.

name: Hikou
description: As an alternative to Kunai, these Tenno throwing stars do less damage but they come with expanded ammo capacity and a higher rate of fire.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.9.1
patchlogs.changes: Increased the flight speed of the Hikou in Quick Steel Conclave Variant.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.1.3.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Hikou not being available for use in Conclaves.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed thrown weapons not showing the proper energy trails as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/469235-hikou-prime-energy-color-doesnt-corresponds-w-chosen-color/

name: Despair
description: Used by The Stalker, Despair throwing blades have a mono-filament edge, sharp enough to penetrate a Warframe.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Despair appearing to be thrown backwards when using Ivara’s Navigator ability.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.changes: Slightly adjusted the location of Despair when holstered.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.10.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Despair using the wrong audio FX on impact.

name: Kunai
description: Kunai throwing daggers offer a silent alternative to the traditional side arm. Perfect for assassins.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.5.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with the Kunai entry diorama being too zoomed in.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the MK1-Kunai alerting enemies instead of being Silent.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.8.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Mk-1 Kunai showing a Platinum cost in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the bloom FX on Spira / Kunai weapons making it too difficult to aim through the glare.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.changes: Slightly improved hit effects to Kunai impact visual.

name: Talons
description: The claws of these tactical bombs dig into the target and detonate on command.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.20.0
patchlogs.changes: Increased the effect of gravity on the Castanas family and Talons in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.6.0
patchlogs.changes: Increased the damage AoE radius of the Talons in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.4.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Castanas, Talons and Ogris projectiles being destroyed in flight doing 4x damage with 2x radius in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Valkyr continuing to have her Talons equipped after Hysteria is deactivated if a player was joining the game while the ability was being activated.

name: Castanas
description: The remotely triggered Castanas quietly deliver a lethal dose of electricity to unsuspecting enemies.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.20.0
patchlogs.changes: Increased the effect of gravity on the Castanas family and Talons in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.6.0
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the damage AoE radius of the Castanas family in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.4.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Castanas, Talons and Ogris projectiles being destroyed in flight doing 4x damage with 2x radius in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Castanas not doing damage when detonated while airborne in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.3.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a bug where the Castanas damage was being displayed incorrectly in the Conclave Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Magnum Force equipped on Castanas modded for multishot resulting in pin-point accuracy.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Castanas not properly functioning with elemental damage and multishot Mods equipped.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Castanas being unable to destroy rotating laser traps in the Void.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Castana explosions not using the proper energy color as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/456501-sancti-castanas-using-default-explosion-color-only/

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Sancti Castanas looking blurry.

name: Hikou Prime
description: As deadly as any bullet without the associated noise or commotion.

name: Spira Prime
description: These rare, braided throwing daggers were a favorite tool of high ranking Orokin assassins.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed script error that could occur in Arsenal with Spira Prime equipped.

name: Spira
description: A flash of red ribbon is the last thing most victims of these throwing-daggers see.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed script error that could occur in Arsenal with Spira Prime equipped.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Spira’s holsters not having the proper positioning on some Warframes.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Spira sticking out of its holster when a player switches between weapons.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Spira not sitting properly on multiple Warframes when holstered.

name: Fusilai
description: Silently lacerate enemies with Gara’s signature glass throwing knives.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where Fusilai would sometimes reload very slowly.

name: Knell
description: Ring the death knell. Headshots briefly turn this scoped pistol into a rapid-fire, Crit Damage fiend that uses no ammo.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mesa’s Peacemaker disabling custom reticles for Snipers/Knell/etc.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a crash when hitting enemies with the Knell while zoomed (32-bit only).

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect projectile sounds with the Zarr and Knell.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Knell not updating it’s scope UI correctly in Conclave.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Knell's Penitence buff not removing when the duration was complete.

name: Zakti
description: Fires razor-sharp darts that anchor themselves in their target before erupting in a plume of toxic gas.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed NPCs that can be given a Secondary weapon, firing the Zakti at an impossibly fast rate.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.1.1
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the AoE damage radius of the Zakti in Conclave
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Zakti projectiles never exploding with toxic gas when killing enemies or hostile objects.

name: Pandero
description: Octavia’s pistol hammers foes with single shots or a rapid volley of bullets.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.15.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed floating clip when reloading the Pandero equipped with the Ceramica Skin.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.7.0
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the damage of Pandero alt fire in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed missing Pandero reload sounds when using it in Dual-Wield.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.3.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Pandero’s alt fire bullets shooting from the holster position after a melee slide attack.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being unable to shoot with the Pandero when downed, except when using alt-fire or when scoped.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.4
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the damage of the Pandero in Conclave.

name: Akjagara
description: The design of these hard-hitting dual pistols is a mix of organic and bladed elements.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.4
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the Damage of the AkJagara in Conclave.*Please Note That We Are Aware Of Reported Sarpa Issues, And Are Working To Reproduce And Resolve Those.:

name: Akstiletto
description: These diminutive rapid-fire Stiletto machine-pistols are just the right size to be akimbo style without sacrificing accuracy.

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixe the Akstiletto Conclave Skin clip shifting to the wrong spot.

name: Azima
description: This intricate automatic pistol is able to fire its clip which then spins in the air for a short time, firing lasers at nearby enemies.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with the Azima and Zenith doing more damage than intended in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Azima’s disc lingering forever which could result in a performance dip.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.6.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error with the Azima.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Azimas Alt Fire lasting a fraction of a second.

name: Aksomati
description: The devastating power of the Soma rifle compacted into two elegant pistols.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.16.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Aksomati firing sound playing when selecting/mousing over the Aksomati in the Arsenal.

name: Pyrana
description: Chew through the enemy with this vicious automatic hand shotgun.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.9
patchlogs.changes: Increased ammo capacity of Pyrana in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.4
patchlogs.changes: Changed Pyrana’s Mag to 10 in Conclave to match PvE values.

name: Hystrix
description: Fire, ice, electricity, or poison: choose an element and launch a flurry deadly quills. This versatile sidearm is Khora’s signature weapon.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.2
patchlogs.fixes: More fixes towards the Hystrix not leaving behind ‘quill’ holes when shooting surfaces.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with incorrect Skins being applicable to the Hystrix.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Hystrix not leaving behind “quill” holes.

name: Vasto Prime
description: This elegant rapid-fire revolver is the embodiment of superior Orokin craftsmanship.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.2
patchlogs.changes: Vasto Prime damage returned to what it was previously in Conclave.

name: Sicarus Prime
description: The Sicarus Prime is an ornamental firearm that fires rounds in rapid bursts, providing a balance between the lethality of auto-pistols and the accuracy of semi-automatic pistols.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.5
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Sicarus Prime having wrong values in Conclave

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 2
patchlogs.changes: Lex Prime, Paris Prime, Dakra Prime, Sicarus Prime, and Ankyros Prime have received the PBR treatment!

name: Lex Prime
description: The Lex Prime is a powerful, accurate pistol that has a low fire rate and clip size. Very efficient at long range.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect materials on Paris Prime and Lex Prime attachments.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 2
patchlogs.changes: Lex Prime, Paris Prime, Dakra Prime, Sicarus Prime, and Ankyros Prime have received the PBR treatment!

name: Ballistica Prime
description: The beauty of this luxuriously gilded crossbow cannot obscure its lethal purpose.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Ballistica Prime not creating proper ‘Ghost’ on Charged Attack kill.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ballistica Prime not unfolding correctly if no primary is equipped.

name: Akstiletto Prime
description: Stylish, discreet and accurate, perfect for the Tenno of distinction.

name: Akbolto Prime
description: Gilded rails adorn these two vicious bolt launching pistols.

name: Magnus
description: The versatile Magnus revolver is a lethal sidearm for any Tenno.

name: Akzani
description: The choice weapon of Mirage, these fast-firing dual pistols deliver a deadly performance.

name: Dex Furis
description: A gift from the Lotus to commemorate the anniversary of the first Tenno waking from Cryo stasis.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2.4
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue where Furis and Dex Furis ejected or loaded clips would not have proper skins or colours.

name: Ballistica
description: The Ballistica crossbow features a unique dual firing mechanism. Choose between a four bolt volley or a deadly accurate charged shot.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Ballistica Prime not creating proper ‘Ghost’ on Charged Attack kill.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ballistica Prime not unfolding correctly if no primary is equipped.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed enemies becoming alert to players using a charged Ballistica shot.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Red Veil allies in Syndicate Missions using the incorrect skin on their Ballistica.

name: Euphona Prime
description: Banshee Prime’s signature shotgun is an instrument of devastation that fires both focused and broad shots.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.7.0
patchlogs.changes: Increased primary fire damage of Euphona Prime in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Euphona Prime’s primary fire projectile not appearing when using low particle settings.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Update 19.12.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Euphona Prime doing no damage to ragdolled enemies.

name: Vasto
description: Steady and reliable, the Vasto revolver combines speed and power for a classic gunslinger feel.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.2
patchlogs.changes: Vasto Prime damage returned to what it was previously in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Vasto Day of the Dead skin not appearing as ‘Owned’ in the Market.

name: Lato
description: The Lato is a highly accurate pistol used by the Tenno everywhere.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Mesa's Regulators not receiving pistol upgrades for missions where you start in Archwing (Uranus).

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Updated icons for the Lato and Braton Vandal.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed misaligned thrusters on Regulator Codex entries.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.11.0+19.11.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Further minor firing sound improvement tweaks to the Braton, Lato and Paris.Hit Indicator Changes:

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.6

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 19.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with the reward manifest on Alator, Mars.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 1
patchlogs.changes: Slightly increased the damage of Lato Vandal in Conclave.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the ‘Vay Hek Frequency Triangulator’ missions appearing for players that still have the key in their inventory.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed/improved the death FX on surveillance drones (Regulators).

patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Lato Vandal Halloween Skin from appearing in the Market on its own.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mesa’s Regulator pistols not being holstered when viewed in the Archwing Arsenal.

name: Lato Vandal
description: A special version of the standard Lato pistol with a slower fire rate but offering higher accuracy and damage values. The Lato Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the grips.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 1
patchlogs.changes: Slightly increased the damage of Lato Vandal in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.9.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Lato Vandal Halloween Skin from appearing in the Market on its own.

name: Lato Prime
description: The Lato is a highly accurate pistol used by the Tenno everywhere. Prime model offers slightly increased damage.

name: Lex
description: The Lex is a powerful, accurate pistol that has a low fire rate and clip size. Very efficient at long range.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.7.0
patchlogs.changes: Lex headshot multiplier reduced to 1.5x in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.4
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Ash’s Bladestorm not marking targets when Heightened Reflexes is equipped in Conclave.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect materials on Paris Prime and Lex Prime attachments.

patchlogs.changes: Lex Prime, Paris Prime, Dakra Prime, Sicarus Prime, and Ankyros Prime have received the PBR treatment!

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.changes: Fixed melee weapons becoming stuck in the player’s hand after blocking an attack via the Reflex Guard Mod.

name: Bronco
description: The Bronco is a small-scale shotgun that can be wielded with one hand. Only effective at close range, it has a limited clip size.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.3.2
patchlogs.changes: Increased Bronco Prime Status Chance to 30% to match AkBronco Prime.

name: Bolto
description: The Bolto fires slow, heavy bolts that are capable of impaling enemies to walls.

patchlogs.changes: Fixed unintended shell dropping sound on Telos Boltor

patchlogs.changes: Fixed missing reload sounds for the Boltor Bravura Skin.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed enemies not being alerted by the Bolto, AkBolto, and Telos AkBolto.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: Fixed projectile weapons (i.e. Boltor) with Punch Through not going through allies.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed crash when you destroy a Blunt with projectiles stuck to it. (eg shoot it with Boltor)

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed muzzle flash on the Akbolto using the wrong energy color.

patchlogs.changes: Fixed muzzle flashes on the Akbolto using the wrong energy color.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.changes: Fixed unique energy colors not applying to the Telos Akbolto and the Vaykor Marelok.

name: Sicarus
description: The Sicarus fires 3-round bursts, which provides a balance between the lethality of auto-pistols and the accuracy of semi-automatic pistols.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.5
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Sicarus Prime having wrong values in Conclave

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 2
patchlogs.changes: Lex Prime, Paris Prime, Dakra Prime, Sicarus Prime, and Ankyros Prime have received the PBR treatment!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.3.5
patchlogs.changes: Increased the damage of Sicarus weapons in PvP.

name: Bronco Prime
description: Infused with rare Orokin alloys, the Bronco Prime is a highly efficient weapon, trading an increased clip size and damage for a lower rate of fire.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.3.2
patchlogs.changes: Increased Bronco Prime Status Chance to 30% to match AkBronco Prime.

name: Furis
description: The Furis delivers a high damage output in a short time frame thanks to its high rate of fire.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.16.3
patchlogs.changes: Updated Afuris description to read "reload speed" instead of "reload time".*We Are Aware And Investigating A Known Issue Where Clients Appear To Be Dealing 0 Damage To Teralyst Synovias, But In Reality You Are Dealing Damage, The Ui Is A Liar.:

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Forest Camo Skin not applying properly to the Furis.

patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue where Furis and Dex Furis ejected or loaded clips would not have proper skins or colours.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed MK1-Furis showing a price of 120 Platinum in the Market.

name: Akbronco Prime
description: Used together, these Orokin pistols feed off each other, inflicting greater damage with an enhanced chance for inducing elemental effects on targets.

patchlogs.changes: Increased Bronco Prime Status Chance to 30% to match AkBronco Prime.

name: Akvasto
description: Vasto revolvers equipped in each hand.

name: Akmagnus
description: Twice the ammo and twice the stopping power of a single Magnus.

name: Twin Vipers
description: A Viper equipped in each hand.

patchlogs.changes: The Viper, Dual Vipers and Wraith Twin Vipers have been given a visual and audio overhaul!

name: Akbronco
description: A Bronco equipped in each hand.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.3.2
patchlogs.changes: Increased Bronco Prime Status Chance to 30% to match AkBronco Prime.

name: Aklato
description: A Lato equipped in each hand. Twice the clip size and fire rate, but reload time is doubled and accuracy is lowered.

name: Akbolto
description: A Bolto equipped in each hand. Twice the clip size and slightly faster fire rate, but reload time is doubled and accuracy is lowered.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed enemies not being alerted by the Bolto, AkBolto, and Telos AkBolto.

name: Afuris

patchlogs.changes: Updated Afuris description to read "reload speed" instead of "reload time".*We Are Aware And Investigating A Known Issue Where Clients Appear To Be Dealing 0 Damage To Teralyst Synovias, But In Reality You Are Dealing Damage, The Ui Is A Liar.:

name: Aklex Prime
description: Savage the enemy with a Lex Prime in each hand.

name: Aklex
description: Dual Lex pistols double the amount of high caliber lead you can throw at the enemy, but accuracy and reload time suffer.

name: Vaykor Marelok
description: Taken from defeated Grineer commanders and rebuilt to improve combat efficiency and reliability.

patchlogs.changes: Fixed unique energy colors not applying to the Telos Akbolto and the Vaykor Marelok.

name: Rakta Ballistica
description: This modified ballistica is the weapon of choice used by Red Veil Assassins to take out high-priority marks.

name: Secura Dual Cestra
description: The favored side-arms of Perrin Sequence executives, these pistols have been modified to improve efficiency and killing potential.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.changes: Increase the visual effect of the Secura Dual Cestra’s shots.

name: Sancti Castanas
description: This remotely detonated electrical trap is used by devotees of New Loka to protect their temples and shrines.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Sancti Castanas looking blurry.

name: Synoid Gammacor
description: Deployed by the Cephalon Suda, once a data-analyzing instrument the Gammacor main focus is defense.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Synoid Gammacor holster position appearing on the floor for Cephalon Suda operatives.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.4
patchlogs.changes: Fixed some instances of the Synoid Gammacor’s beam lingering after use.

name: Gammacor
description: Designed to quickly vaporize minerals for content analysis, users discovered its powerful beam was equally efficient at dispatching hostiles.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Synoid Gammacor holster position appearing on the floor for Cephalon Suda operatives.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0

patchlogs.changes: Fixed some instances of the Synoid Gammacor’s beam lingering after use.

name: Telos Akbolto
description: For the Arbiters of Hexis these pistols are more than simple weapons, they are symbols of truth and discipline.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed enemies not being alerted by the Bolto, AkBolto, and Telos AkBolto.

name: Mk1-Kunai
description: The MK1-Kunai is the standard issue throwing knives for all Tenno.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the MK1-Kunai alerting enemies instead of being Silent.

name: Mk1-Furis
description: The MK1-Furis are the standard issue automatic pistol for all Tenno.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed MK1-Furis showing a price of 120 Platinum in the Market.

name: Embolist
description: A living weapon, the infested Embolist pistol kills its victims with an acidic venomous gas.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Embolist chest piece clipping into the Nyx Immortal, Saikou, Athena, and Carnifex Skins.

name: Tysis
description: The Tysis pistol spits out caustic darts that corrode their victims from within.

name: Dual Toxocyst

name: Pox
description: These festering sacs of pus and gas burst violently on impact.

patchlogs.changes: Pox will no longer play Hit Notification sounds on Damage over Time ticks.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed constant pulsing of the crosshair from Mutalist Cernos and Pox DOT.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Pox not changing its orientation when thrown.

name: Twin Vipers Wraith
description: The uniquely styled Twin Vipers Wraith are a powerful variation on the standard akimbo machine-pistols.

name: Viper Wraith
description: The uniquely styled Viper Wraith is a powerful variation on the standard machine-pistol.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.9.0
patchlogs.changes: Viper Wraith damage reduced in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Viper Wraith not being tradeable.

name: Atomos
description: This particle cannon generates a condensed beam of super-heated plasma designed to melt rock to ore, and enemies to molten slag.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a rare crash from starting a mission with a beam style weapon (Atomos, Spectra, etc).

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.6.3
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked the Atomos rumbling feedback duration when using a controller.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.7.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with the Atomos rumble on controllers.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed performance issues related to the Atomos.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed some lingering visual FX from Atomos/Amprex when used with Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/518981-atomos-beam-glitch-with-mirage-hom/

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Atomos not properly alerting enemies on use.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue causing Atomos particle effects to hover in mid-air after being fired as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/463128-floating-atomos-beams/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a visual bug related to using the Atomos on certain enemies as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/458340-atomos-specific-infested-death-animation-visual-bug/

name: Stubba
description: Inflict rapid-fire bursts of pain with this Grineer submachine gun.

name: Kulstar
description: Rain hell on the enemy with this handheld cluster-rocket launcher.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Kulstar’s secondary fire hitting enemies outside of Limbo’s rift while Limbo is riftwalking.

name: Twin Rogga
description: These twin barrels of destruction are the signature pistols of the Kuva Guardians.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.17.4
patchlogs.changes: Kuva Guardians will now play their disarming animation properly, instead of having their Twin Rogga’s magically pop into their hands.We’Re Working On A Script To Give The Respective Shoulder Armor To Those Who Purchased The Tennogen Skin. We Will Update You Here When It Is Running/Complete. Script Has Been Run And Has Completed! Please Relog If You Purchased The Banshee Sonority Skin Pre-Hotfix.:

name: Kohmak
description: Like the larger Kohm, this hand-shotgun doubles its volley with each successive shot.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2.4
patchlogs.changes: Fixed timing issues with the Kohmak reload animations.

name: Twin Kohmak
description: Doubling their volley on each successive shot, the Twin Kohmaks decimate foes in seconds.

name: Nukor
description: Creates and focuses a high-frequency field of microwaves, literally cooking the target from within.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Nukor creating a ton of FX if it kills something while it's been paused by Harrow's Condemn ability.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed coloring on Nukor as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/457936-update-1655/page-2#entry5097301

name: Marelok
description: The Marelok combines the stopping power of a rifle with the portability of a pistol.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U4.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed duplicate Marelok appearing in the market. Players who purchased this item have automatically received a refund.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.changes: Fixed unique energy colors not applying to the Telos Akbolto and the Vaykor Marelok.

name: Brakk
description: Simple but powerful. The semi-automatic Brakk hand cannon delivers a lot of punch in a small package.

name: Stug
description: Firing a sticky, toxic, explosive compound, the Stug Gel Gun offers multiple ejection modes, delivering maximum damage in all situations.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.10 & Tactial Alert: Divine Will
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Stug occasionally firing in the wrong direction, too far off to the side.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Stug displaying the incorrect trigger type in the Arsenal as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/568459-u18-bug-report-megathread/page-36#entry6699873

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed uncharged Stug shots doing the same damage as fully charged when upgraded with multishot mods.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2.4
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Stug having no Magazine stat in the Arsenal.

name: Twin Grakatas
description: When one Grakata isn't enough, bring another for extra firepower.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with the hips of Warframe’s appearing to stretch when playing Agile Akimbo, (Twin Vipers, Twin Grakatas, etc) Bow, and Pistol idles.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.5
patchlogs.changes: Added unique reload sounds to the Twin Grakatas.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Twin Grakatas and Ack & Brunt not properly using player’s custom Energy color.

name: Seer
description: Captain Vor's prized Orokin-Grineer hybrid pistol has an average rate of fire, but it has high damage and superior zoom capabilities.

name: Kraken
description: The Kraken is a heavy pistol of Grineer design that fires two quick shots with a single pull of the trigger. Skilled marksmen will appreciate the value in this deadly accurate weapon.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed caches on Kuva Fortress/Dakata giving rewards from the incorrect table (thereby not dropping Cyclone Kraken as intended).

name: Viper
description: A full-auto pistol known as the most compact and lightweight weapon of the Grineer arsenal. Though it has a small clip size, the Viper has a very high fire rate and ultra-fast reload times thanks to a simplified magazine design.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.9.0
patchlogs.changes: Viper Wraith damage reduced in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed using the Viper with the Skull Shots Mod or a Grakata with the Brain Storm Mod, activating the headshot bonus with the final shot in your magazine resulting in the weapon to fire much faster than intended in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Viper Wraith not being tradeable.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with the hips of Warframe’s appearing to stretch when playing Agile Akimbo, (Twin Vipers, Twin Grakatas, etc) Bow, and Pistol idles.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.changes: The Viper, Dual Vipers and Wraith Twin Vipers have been given a visual and audio overhaul!

patchlogs.name: Update 15.12.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Viper not having the correct tint on its Forest camouflage skin.

name: Twin Gremlins
description: Designed as a pair, these Grineer sidearms fire projectiles at a slower rate but with greater force and accuracy.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed missing weapon trails from projectiles created by the Akbolto, Prime Boltor, Telos Boltor, Telos Akbolto, and Twin Gremlins.

name: Arca Scisco
description: This scoped pistol analyzes strikes, learning how to damage its targets most effectively. Achieve maximum damage output after five successive hits.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Hotfix 21.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Clients not seeing the Arca Scisco beams.

name: Prisma Angstrum
description: Imbued with the finest Prisma crystal, this refined Angstrum features boosted charge and reload speeds.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Hotfix 21.7.1
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked the firing sounds of the Prisma Angstrum.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Improved the mesh quality of the Angstrum and Prisma Angstrum to avoid blocky textures.

name: Angstrum
description: Capable of firing multiple rockets at once, the Angstrum is a handheld instrument of destruction.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Hotfix 21.7.1
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked the firing sounds of the Prisma Angstrum.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Improved the mesh quality of the Angstrum and Prisma Angstrum to avoid blocky textures.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Angstrum's charge animation not loading bullets into the weapon chamber.

name: Staticor
description: Send a massive charge of potential energy hurling toward unfortunate targets.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Staticor not consuming ammo after the mag is depleted.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Idle animations not playing when the Staticor is equipped.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.9
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Staticor shots missing sound.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.10 & Tactial Alert: Divine Will
patchlogs.changes: Fixed some of the Staticor’s visual FX firing from the player’s feet.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.8
patchlogs.changes: Visual tweaks to Staticor
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Staticor’s “glow” offset being inconsistent

name: Cycron
description: Forgo ammunition with the regenerating energy disc in this plasma throwing pistol.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Scourge and Cycron Status lasting longer for the Host.

name: Sonicor
description: Blasts targets with a massive wave of sonic energy. Results reported to be: 'Very Satisfying'.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.4
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Sonicor doing pve damage in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.10.1+19.10.1.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Sonicor not causing knock down in Conclave.The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.10.1.1:

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an improper trigger finger animation appearing on players with the Sonicor equipped, but not in use.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Sonicor sometimes appearing invisible in player hands.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Sonicor projectiles detonating from inside the wall of a Snowglobe.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Sonicor’s projectiles not being stopped on Nullifier shields.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Sonicor’s reload audio FX not playing.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with the Sonicor/Gammacor holsters using the wrong energy colour.

name: Dual Cestra
description: Wield two Cestras to unleash a dual torrent of high energy bolts.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed weapon skins not properly attaching to the Cestra and Dual Cestras.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.4.3 + Credit Reimbursement #2
patchlogs.changes: Made various audio adjustments to the Cestra and Dual Cestra.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.changes: Increase the visual effect of the Secura Dual Cestra’s shots.

name: Cestra
description: Compact and deadly, the Cestra discharges bolts of energy at an increasingly rapid rate.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Cestra’s barrel not properly sitting in the correct position after a reload.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.4.3 + Credit Reimbursement #2
patchlogs.changes: Made various audio adjustments to the Cestra and Dual Cestra.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.changes: Increase the visual effect of the Secura Dual Cestra’s shots.

name: Detron
description: The sleek lines of the Detron conceal its ferocious nature. The hand cannon's semi-automatic action takes down enemies with speed and efficiency.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a script error in Somachord if the loop button is pressed while no songs are playing.*We Have A Fix For The Detron'S Incorrect Status Chance. Aiming To Get Another Hotfix Out Before The Weekend That Will Include This!:

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed numerous projectile weapons (Detron, Drakgoon, Cernos Prime, etc) having incorrect Status Chance calculations.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Detron Mara having the name switched as Mara Detron.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Zanuka having a chance of dropping both the Detron Blueprint and a Detron part (unlike any other Stalker-type enemy).

name: Spectra
description: While its intended design is for deep space construction, the concentrated laser beam of the Spectra is highly effective against organic and synthetic enemies.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.12.0
patchlogs.changes: Chroma can no longer jump or sprint when using Spectral Scream.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a rare crash from starting a mission with a beam style weapon (Atomos, Spectra, etc).

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma’s Spectral Scream idle animation not playing the hunch over animation.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error with Chroma’s Spectral Scream on Dedicated Servers.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma’s Spectral Scream preventing players from being able to use quick melee.

name: Acrid
description: The Acrid fires an acidic-infused needle.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.17.0 + 22.17.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed cases of the Teralyst literally dissolving when killed with the Acrid.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Acrid’s Toxin DoT not applying to Osprey enemies.

name: Sweeper
description: Standard issue weapon for Carrier Sentinel. Fires shotgun rounds.

name: Deconstructor
description: Causes the Helios Sentinel to attack enemy targets using pieces of itself.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Update 19.12.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed being able to equip Deconstructor on a Sentinel that is not Helios.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Helios not attacking enemies when equipped with the Deconstructor.

name: Vulklok
description: Standard issue sniper rifle for Diriga.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Vulklok not properly receiving adjustments to magazine size, fire-rate and reload time via Mods.

name: Stinger
description: Standard issue weapon for Djinn Sentinel. Fires poisonous projectiles.

name: Prisma Burst Laser
description: Fires a small burst of lasers.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to equip a Burst Laser Riven Mod on the Prisma Burst Laser as per:

name: Sweeper Prime
description: Standard issue weapon for Carrier Prime Sentinel. Fires shotgun rounds.

name: Prime Laser Rifle
description: A Prime Laser Rifle.

name: Laser Rifle
description: A laser rifle developed by reverse-engineering Corpus technology.

name: Artax
description: Freeze targets in their tracks with this sentinel mounted ice-beam.

name: Deth Machine Rifle
description: Standard issue weaponry signature to Dethcube.

name: Burst Laser
description: Fires a small burst of lasers.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to equip a Burst Laser Riven Mod on the Prisma Burst Laser as per:

name: Deconstructor Prime
description: Allows the Helios Prime to violently disassemble and turn itself into a deadly projectile.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Update 19.12.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed being able to equip Deconstructor on a Sentinel that is not Helios.
